title: Doctor Syntax Setting Out in Search of A Wife
text: The Third Tour of Doctor Syntax, in Search for a Wife details the silly escapades that unfold in the reverend's pursuit of a new mate. Rowlandson amusingly sends his hero off on this adventure by presenting the indecorous, undignified view of both Syntax and his horse from behind.
creditline:
The Minnich Collection
The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund, 1966
